word: H1288 - בָרַךְ - bârak - baw-rak' - [idiom] abundantly - ஏராளமாக

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - முழங்காற்படியிடு, ஆசீர்வதி, ஸ்தோத்திரப்படு, ஸ்தோத்திரம், உண்டாக்கு, தூஷி, புகழ், பெருமை பாராட்டு, வாழ்த்து
b) (Niphal) to be blessed, to bless oneself
d) (Pual) to be blessed, to be adored
2) to praise, to salute, to curse

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to kneel; by implication to bless God (as an act of adoration), and (vice-versa) man (as a benefit); also (by euphemism) to curse (God or the king, as treason): - X abundantly, X altogether, X at all, blaspheme, bless, congratulate, curse, X greatly, X indeed, kneel (down), praise, salute, X still, thank.
Cognate: H1263, H1288, H1290, H1292, H1293, H1294, H1295, H1296, H3000
